requirements.jd_requirement: Lead projects that improve scalability, reliability, and cost efficiency across existing systems.
requirements.matched_skills: CI/CD pipelines, Automated build and deploy workflows, Operational reliability practices
requirements.evidence: Owned end-to-end delivery of security automation pipelines using GitHub Actions/GitLab CI, with strong focus on repeatability and production stability.

requirements.jd_requirement: Build data-intensive workflows, background jobs, and event-driven pipelines.
requirements.matched_skills: Multi-source ingestion, Data normalization, Correlation logic, Entity resolution
requirements.evidence: Designed and operated data pipelines for security telemetry ingestion, normalization, and correlation across heterogeneous systems.

requirements.jd_requirement: Own service SLIs/SLOs and collaborate on incident response and post-incident reviews.
requirements.evidence: Developed runbooks and SLI/SLO frameworks for security tooling; led post-incident reviews with cross-functional teams to close gaps.

requirements.matched_skills: Log analysis, Anomaly-oriented analysis, Security metrics and reporting
requirements.evidence: Built security analytics dashboards using Grafana/Prometheus; developed anomaly detection logic for vulnerability patterns and operational drift.

requirements.jd_requirement: Contribute to our CI/CD and release processes to ship safely and quickly.
requirements.evidence: Designed and maintained CI/CD workflows for internal tooling; automated release gates and deployment validation.

requirements.jd_requirement: Partner with product teams to deliver features end-to-end, from design docs to production.
requirements.matched_skills: Cross-functional execution, Technical architecture communication, Requirements-to-controls translation
requirements.evidence: Collaborated across security, IAM, and infrastructure teams to translate high-level requirements into deployable controls and operational workflows.

requirements.jd_requirement: Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Pulumi preferred; Terraform/CDK also fine).
requirements.evidence: Used Terraform and Ansible to provision cloud infrastructure for security tooling; experienced in declarative infrastructure management.

requirements.jd_requirement: Proficient in TypeScript and/or Go, ideally with 5+ years building production services.
requirements.evidence: Built internal tooling with TypeScript/Node.js and React; strong backend experience via FastAPI (Python) and Flask.

requirements.jd_requirement: Comfortable with cloud infrastructure (AWS preferred) and container orchestration.
requirements.matched_skills: AWS ECS deployments, IAM, Containerized security services
requirements.evidence: Deployed and secured containerized services on AWS ECS with IAM, secrets management, and service hardening patterns.

requirements.jd_requirement: Familiar with multi-tenant architectures, API design, and data modelling.
requirements.evidence: Designed and operated multi-tenant APIs for internal tooling; implemented data models to support cross-team ingestion and reconciliation.

requirements.jd_requirement: Experience with Postgres internals, logical replication, or CDC pipelines.
requirements.evidence: Built pipelines for ingesting and normalizing data from heterogeneous sources — transferable to CDC/logical replication patterns.

tone_notes: Emphasize operational reliability, production-grade tooling, and cross-functional collaboration over pure security analysis. Align with Supabase’s open-source-first, developer-centric culture by highlighting shipping, documentation, and systems thinking. Avoid over-emphasizing defensive/security-only mindset; instead, frame experience as enabling developer velocity through secure infrastructure.
summary_angle: Position as a security-minded platform engineer who builds scalable, observable, and reliable distributed systems — with deep experience in cloud-native automation, data pipelines, and operational reliability that directly supports Supabase’s platform goals.
